page.title: 03 Wentworth Tenants
page.content: We interviewed the{tenant}at{33 Main {Street}she said "that{Cuddlys}wine bar used to be a{blacksmiths}and then a{garage.}She is{72 years old}and she said she likes the village.She has been living there for{40 years.}She took us to see the tenant at{no.2 {Clay Field Lane}and she said that she is{82 years of age}and has lived there all her life.She told us that her husband was the{chauffeur}at{Wentworth {Woodhouse}and her father was the {valet}(the valet means he dressed rich men) for{Earl Fitzwilliam}at{Wentworth {Woodhouse.}She said that they were a lovely family to work for. The{stone {blocks}outside her house were used for making{butter.}Because her father and husband work there they gave her a cottage.She work there as a{dresser for the{Earl Fizwilliams wife.}She also said the house has 365 windows.
